data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 594 believers in Christ Church Nichola Town, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Christ Church Nichola Town. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 594 believers in the state of Christ Church Nichola Town the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mansion
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mansion, Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Spirit, teach the 594 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.focus_label: Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Christ Church Nichola Town
location.full_name: Christ Church Nichola Town, Saint Kitts and Nevis
